title: Clinton Voters Spawned #NotMySuperBowlChamps, Then It Backfired In Spectacular Fashion
text:
Clinton Voters Spawned #NotMySuperBowlChamps, Then It Backfired In Spectacular Fashion   
By Phillip Stucky | The Daily Caller 
Dejected liberals who opposed the New England Patriots based on the teamâ€™s connection to President Donald Trump started a Twitter hashtag opposing the results of the big game Sunday. 
Following the results of the game, Trump supporters hijacked the hashtag for a vehicle of vicious gloating. 
Democrats nationwide criticized quarterback Tom Brady, as well as Head Coach Bill Belichick and owner Robert Kraft for supporting Trump during the 2016 election. 
Hey @ShaunKing , why'd you delete this tweet? Don't worry, I saved it for you. You're welcome.. #SB51 #NotMySuperBowlChamps #boycottbudwiser pic.twitter.com/pOHfI7bmzt
